abstract: It was unclear whether the thieves targeted the truck, or whether they inadvertently ended up with the highest podiums in the land.
snippet: It was unclear whether the thieves targeted the truck, or whether they inadvertently ended up with the highest podiums in the land.
lead_paragraph: Thieves stole a truck filled with more than $200,000 worth of sound equipment, podiums and presidential seals used by President Obama, a Virginia affiliate of NBC News reports.

headline.main: Thieves Said to Steal Truck Carrying Presidential Equipment
